about_the_game:
Street Karate


New character, a new mission and lots of new enemies. In this sequel of Street Karate you will make good use of your fighting skills.

When night falls, the streets belong to the bad guys. They are looking for a lone passerby to mug, and perhaps knock out a couple teeth for good measure. The townspeople live in fear of the dark streets. Well, not everyone. Meet Severe Jack - big tough guy who is not afraid to kick some bad guy ass. Today he came out of the sports arena and discovered that someone had stolen his car. That was the last straw. Severe Jack is going hunting. Here is a nice example of a very rare game genre on the PC - beat 'em up. The game was made in the best traditions of street fight platformers. Clear the levels, retaking the street from the bad guys, using only your fists.

Controls
WASD or Arrow - Move
Ctrl, Alt or J - Attack
Shift, Space or K - Jump

FEATURES :


- Classic 2D street fighting style.
- More levels and enemies.
- Engaging soundtrack.
- Lots of fighting moves - combos, airstrikes, and throws.

name: Street Karate 2

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: WINDOWS XP / WINDOWS VISTA / WINDOWS 7 / WINDOWS 8 / WINDOWS 10
  • Processor: Any 64 or 32 bit processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX or OpenGL Compatible Video card
  • Storage: 60 MB available space
